title: The Commissioner may grant permission for temporary construction of a period not exceeding six month at a time and in the aggregate, not exceeding a period of three years
clause_text: The Commissioner may grant permission for temporary construction of a period not exceeding six month at a time and in the aggregate, not exceeding a period of three years. Such permission may be given by him for the construction of the following, namely: Structures for protection from the rain or covering of the terraces during the monsoon only; Pandals for fairs, ceremonies, religious functions,circus, jatra, folk dance etc; Structures for godowns/storage of construction materials within the site;

source_pdf.text_snippet: The Commissioner may grant permission for temporary construction of a period not exceeding six month at a time and in the aggregate, not exceeding a period of three years. Such permission may be given
